it.polimi.ingsw.cg11.communication.commons

Interface BrokerInterface

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Broker

    public interface BrokerInterface
extends java.rmi.Remote
    Simple broker interface we export to provide a way for the client to subscribe to a game and receive its updates
    Author:
    GerlandoSavio

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void subscribe(SubscriberInterface subscriber, java.util.UUID clientId)
      Subscribes to a game

    • Method Detail

      • subscribe

        void subscribe(SubscriberInterface subscriber,
             java.util.UUID clientId)
               throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Subscribes to a game
        Parameters:
        subscriber - the interface on which the broker calls the dispatch message method
        clientId - the unique id of the client to find in which game it belongs
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException
